word_group.phrase: make hay while the sun shines

list.abstract: SUN（英[sʌn]，美[sʌn]），英语单词，作名词为太阳；恒星；阳光。作动词为坐在阳光下；晒；曝。短语搭配有sun set（日落）。例句为“When the sun goes down, the stars come out.（当太阳落山时，星星就会出来。）”
SUN，说唱歌手。 2019年6月14日，参加的华语青年说唱音乐节目《中国新说唱2019》在爱奇艺播出。

yingyinNormal.en: Was that place the sun?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那那个地方是太阳？

yingyinNormal.en: You won't remember, but the Sun has scorched our world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们肯定不记得，但太阳烤焦了整个世界。

yingyinNormal.en: The purple bacteria live by harnessing energy from the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种紫色的细菌依靠吸收太阳的能量而生长。

yingyinNormal.en: Sun, Sea and Snow
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳，海和雪

yingyinNormal.en: Well, when the earth does get pushed a little bit towards the sun, the sun's pull speeds it up a little bit, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯哼，这样说好了，当地球真的受到来自太阳引力影响往太阳靠近时，太阳拉力也会使得地球运行速度相对增加一些些。

yingyinNormal.en: The sun shines all the time. When we see it, it's day. So for us the sun shines during the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳一直在照射地球，我们能看到阳光的时候就是白天，所以对我们来说，太阳在日间照射。

yingyinNormal.en: The sun is very hot, so Peppa and George have to have sun cream on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳太毒啦，所以佩琪和乔治都得先涂上防晒霜。

yingyinNormal.en: More suns in the sky than you can count. Every sun that crosses our sky comes to rest up there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天上有数不清的太阳。每一个曾划过天空的太阳都在这里休息。

yingyinNormal.en: A king's time as ruler rises and falls like the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个国王的统治，就跟太阳的起落是相同的。

yingyinNormal.en: So even though the nearby sun's pull is stronger, the earth will be going fast enough that it overshoots and ends up farther away from the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，就算愈靠近太阳，所受引力愈强。地球也会因为速度够快，以致于产生所谓"过冲"现象，且最后远远离开太阳。

yingyinNormal.en: It uses the power of the sun. As the weapon is charged the sun is drained until it disappears.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们用的是太阳能，太阳能会随着武器装载而渐渐耗尽，直到太阳消失。

yingyinNormal.en: Three little kittens loved to play, they had fun in the sun all day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 3只小猫爱玩耍 太阳下玩了一整天

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, the pull of gravity is stronger the closer you are to the sun, so you'd think that if the earth got bumped slightly towards the sun (like, if you jumped, or something), then the sun would pull just a little bit stronger, tugging the earth yet closer still, at which point the sun's pull would be stronger yet again, and the earth would spiral in to its eventual doom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的意思是，地心引力的拉力随着物体与之距离愈近而增强，所以你可能会觉得如果地球稍微离太阳靠近一些些（像是你跳起来，离天花板就比站立时近一些，之类的），然后太阳对地球的拉力就会增加一点点，将地球往太阳拉近一些，然后，随着距离拉近一些，太阳对地球的拉力又再次微幅增加，直到地球会以螺旋轨迹方式，最终撞上太阳，而毁灭。e

yingyinNormal.en: Sun goes down, the tablet starts to glow, everything comes to life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳落山，牌匾开始发光，展品都复活了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: The sun is shining. It is a very hot day. What a lovely, hot day!
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳高照。天气很热。多么美好，炎热的一天啊！

yingyinNormal.en: I am Merenkahre, Pharaoh of the Nile and Father to the Son of the Sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是门卡乌拉，尼罗河法老，太阳之子的父亲。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: The sun is shining. It is a very hot day. What a lovely, hot day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳当空照着，天气非常的炎热。真是个不错的大热天啊。

yingyinNormal.en: And George's is Blue. Yummy. Look, the sun has come out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有乔治的是。蓝色！嘿嘿嘿。好吃！好吃！好吃！看呐，太阳出来了！

yingyinNormal.en: The sun shines during the day. Ms. Matthews will argue the affirmative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辩题是“太阳在日间照射”，有请正方马修斯小姐发言。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you ever wondered how the earth stays in orbit around the sun?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可曾有想过地球是如何在围绕着太阳周边的轨道运行着吗？

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: fly too close to the sun

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 日光；阳光
n. 日落；黄昏；傍晚；晚霞；衰落期
n. 阳光；日照；朋友；小子；幸福；快乐

word_family.mean: n. 太阳；日；阳光；日光；太阳热；一天；一年；恒星；荣耀；繁荣；(Sun) 星期天 (Sunday的缩写)

examination_example.sentence: Copernicus theorized in 1543 that all of the planets that we knew of revolved not around the Earth,but the <highlight>Sun</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哥白尼在1543年提出了一个理论：我们所知道的所有行星都不是围绕着地球转的，而是绕着太阳转的。

examination_example.sentence: What happens when the wind doesn't blow or the <highlight>sun</highlight> doesn't shine?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 风不吹或者太阳不照会怎么样？

examination_example.sentence: Our mental health doesn't really go anywhere; like the <highlight>sun</highlight> behind a cloud.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的心理健康并没有真的去往任何地方；就像云后面的太阳一样。

word_usage.usage: sun表示太阳或阳光时，一般要与定冠词the搭配使用。表示太阳时，首字母大写，用the Sun表达。

examination_example.sentence: Crawling from their underground nests into the <highlight>sun</highlight>'s brutal rays to hunt for food is the perfect time to seek lunch.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从它们的地下巢穴爬进酷热的阳光中寻找食物是寻找午餐的最佳时机。

examination_example.sentence: The scientists found that their thick, triangular hair reflects light, giving them a metallic reflection and protecting them from the <highlight>sun</highlight>'s awful heat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们发现，它们浓密的三角形毛发能反射光线，给它们一种金属反射，保护它们免受太阳的酷热折磨。

examination_example.sentence: Rolling green hills, palm trees, <highlight>sun</highlight>-kissed flowers are evident in the many stories of people who grew up poor and rose to enormous success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 连绵起伏的青山、棕榈树、阳光明媚的花朵在许多人的故事中显而易见，这些人从小贫穷，后来取得了巨大的成功。

word_usage.usage: sun表示“太阳”时，需加定冠词the。

examination_example.sentence: I climbed to the top of a small rise looking at a wonderfully clear view with the <highlight>sun</highlight> setting in the west.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我爬到一个小上升的顶部，看着西边的太阳落山，景色非常清晰。

examination_example.sentence: This is how my novel, The Line of the <highlight>Sun</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是我的小说《太阳之线》。

examination_example.sentence: The weatherman said the <highlight>sun</highlight> wouldn't come out until next week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 天气预报员说下星期才出太阳。

examination_example.sentence: Of course, we notice it when the <highlight>sun</highlight> is shining.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，当阳光明媚时，我们会注意到它。

examination_example.sentence: The gases trap(储存)the <highlight>sun</highlight>'s heat and act like blanket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些气体能捕获太阳的热量，起到毯子的作用。

examination_example.sentence: Solar panels take energy from the <highlight>sun</highlight> and turn it into electricity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 太阳能电池板从太阳获取能量并将其转化为电能。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>sun</highlight> was falling behind the hills.

sense_info_list.zh: 阳光;日光浴; 晒太阳

examination_example.sentence: The cicada finds a place in the <highlight>sun</highlight> to dry its new shell and wings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蝉在阳光下找到一个地方来晒干它的新壳和翅膀。

examination_example.sentence: It's important to stay out of the <highlight>sun</highlight> during the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白天远离太阳是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: Clothes protect you from the <highlight>sun</highlight> and keep water in your body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 衣服可以保护你不受阳光照射，并保持体内水分。

examination_example.sentence: The film is directed by Peter Ho-<highlight>sun</highlight> Chan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这部电影由陈可辛执导。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sun</highlight> Baoquan is one of the inventors.
One day, Cao Cao got a huge elephant from <highlight>Sun</highlight> Quan and he wanted to know the weight of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天，曹操从孙权那里得到一头大象，他想知道它的重量。

word_usage.usage: sun表示“太阳”时，需加定冠词the。
